mapper.select: SELECT id, title, url, perm_code, icon FROM privilege p RIGHT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT r.pid FROM role_privilege r WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM user_role u WHERE u.uid=#{userId} AND r.rid=u.rid )) a ON p.id=a.pid WHERE p.pid = #{pid} AND type=0 ORDER BY sort
